```{r}
minx <- min(Aalborg$xkoor)
miny <- min(Aalborg$ykoor)
numbx <- ceiling(max(Aalborg$xkoor)-minx)
numby <- ceiling(max(Aalborg$ykoor)-miny)
y <- GridTopology(c(minx,miny),c(1,1),c(numbx,numby))
```

```{r}
coordinates(Aalborg) <- ~xkoor+ykoor
Aalborg2 <- sp2RF(Aalborg, param = list(n=1, vdim=49))
```


```{r}
pris <- log(Aalborg2$Kontantpris)
model <- pris ~ 1
model2 <- RMgengneiting()
c <- RFfit(model=model,params = list(n=1, vdim=49) , data= Aalborg2, allowdistanceZero=TRUE)
```
